title: EXPOSING the RINO Sabotage in Arizona, Utah, and Alaska with Blake Masters
itunes:title: EXPOSING the RINO Sabotage in Arizona, Utah, and Alaska with Blake Masters
description:
Charlie kicks off today’s episode with Republican nominee for Senate in Arizona, Blake Masters, who is in one of the toughest midterm races in the entire country—and one of the most critical. With Mark Kelly’s millions of dollars against him, Blake has had to fight tooth and nail against one of the best funded incumbents in the country, while Mitch McConnell abandons the state. Still, despite the headwinds, Masters is within 1 point of Kelly and makes a big announcement of new commitments and upcoming TV ads to counter the onslaught. Next, Charlie exposes Mitt Romney's betrayal in Utah, and Mitch McConnell's treachery in Alaska. Pay attention! RINOs are trying to sabotage the midterms, and they're doing it right under our noses.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
